Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: Typical real dutch cafe with an artistic swing. Lot of yongsters and metro people mixing with the real Amsterdam incrowd. You can see lesbians kissing, famous actors and just anything... relaxed atmosphere. Do try the Dutch Vieux (poor man's cognac) they serve.

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: It's the caf√© of the Bellevue theater, and you feel it. Interesting people around, mixed with the actors relaxing after the show

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: Exquisite food, nice staff, good prices, we loved it!

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: Beer, wine, whiskey. There's a movie theater next door

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great food, fine wine, good service. We arrived with a party of 6 without having made a reservation. Was no problem at all. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very cozy cafe by the theatre. Always little place to sit. But no problem to share table here. Coffee is fine! ‚Ä¶

Name: De Smoeshaan
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice coffee good beer and very friendly staff. What is especially nice is that it is next to the theater and there are no tourists, or at least I have not seen them there. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Suitable for a drink during the break of a performance. High canteen content, so not very suitable for just going for a drink. ‚Ä¶
